segments.text: Those kids are really going for it, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging out of the cabinet to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to have this all planned out, it's almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit happy for them, they seem to be having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, they seem so practiced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is just adding to the chaos, but they don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much of a mess, but I doubt they're thinking about that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen, but it's almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR
